mapper.select: SELECT CUR_CODE AS CURCODE, CUR_CLAPRDCODE AS CURCLAPRDCODE, CUR_CLASELCODE AS CURCLASELCODE, CUR_CLACTECODE AS CURCLACTECODE, CUR_NAME AS CURNAME, CUR_INFO AS CURINFO, CUR_STARTDATE AS CURSTARTDATE, CUR_ENDDATE AS CURENDDATE, CUR_TIME AS CURTIME FROM CUR WHERE CUR_CLAPRDCODE = #{claPrdCode} AND CUR_CLACTECODE = #{claCteCode} AND CUR_CLASELCODE = #{claSelCode}
SELECT * FROM CLASSINFO WHERE (CLASELCODE= #{claSelCode} AND CLACTECODE=#{claCteCode} AND CLAPRDCODE=#{claPrdCode})

SELECT NTC_CLASELCODE AS NTCCLASELCODE, NTC_CLACTECODE AS NTCCLACTECODE, NTC_CLAPRDCODE AS NTCCLAPRDCODE, NTC_CODE AS NTCCODE, NTC_NAME AS NTCNAME, NTC_INFO AS NTCINFO, NTC_DATE AS NTCDATE FROM NTC WHERE (NTC_CLASELCODE=#{claSelCode} AND NTC_CLACTECODE=#{claCteCode} AND NTC_CLAPRDCODE=#{claPrdCode})

SELECT ASS_CLASELCODE AS ASSCLASELCODE, ASS_CLACTECODE AS ASSCLACTECODE, ASS_CLAPRDCODE AS ASSCLAPRDCODE, ASS_CODE AS ASSCODE, ASS_NAME AS ASSNAME, ASS_INFO AS ASSINFO, ASS_STARTDATE AS ASSSTARTDATE, ASS_ENDDATE AS ASSENDDATE, ASS_MAXGRADE AS ASSMAXGRADE, ASS.ASS_ENDDATE-TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YY-MM-DD') AS ASSSTATE, TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YY-MM-DD')- ASS.ASS_STARTDATE AS ASSSTATE2, STU.STU_ORDBUYCODE AS ASSBUYCODE, STU.STU_ORDDATE AS ASSBUYDATE FROM ASS INNER JOIN STU ON (ASS.ASS_CLASELCODE=STU.STU_CLASELCODE AND ASS.ASS_CLACTECODE=STU.STU_CLACTECODE AND ASS.ASS_CLAPRDCODE=STU.STU_CLAPRDCODE) WHERE (STU_CLASELCODE=#{claSelCode} AND STU_CLACTECODE=#{claCteCode} AND STU_CLAPRDCODE=#{claPrdCode} AND STU.STU_ORDBUYCODE=#{buyCode})
SELECT ASS_NAME AS "TITLE", ASS_STARTDATE AS "START", ASS_ENDDATE AS "END" FROM ASS WHERE ASS_CLASELCODE= #{claSelCode} AND ASS_CLACTECODE= #{claCteCode} AND ASS_CLAPRDCODE= #{claPrdCode}

SELECT SUB.SUB_GRADE AS SUBGRADE, SUB.SUB_STUORDDATE AS SUBSTUORDDATE, SUB.SUB_INFO AS SUBINFO, SUB.SUB_DATE AS SUBDATE, SBF.SBF_FILNAME AS SBFFILNAME FROM SUB LEFT OUTER JOIN SBF ON( SUB_ASSCLAPRDCODE=SBF_SUBASSCLAPRDCODE AND SUB_ASSCLACTECODE=SBF_SUBASSCLACTECODE AND SUB_ASSCLASELCODE=SBF_SUBASSCLASELCODE AND SUB_ASSCODE= SBF_SUBASSCODE) WHERE (SUB_ASSCLAPRDCODE=#{assClaPrdCode} AND SUB_ASSCLASELCODE=#{assClaSelCode} AND SUB_ASSCLACTECODE=#{assClaCteCode} AND SUB_ASSCODE =#{assCode} AND SUB.SUB_STUORDBUYCODE=#{assBuyCode})

SELECT LOC_CLAPRDCODE AS LOCCLAPRDCODE, LOC_CLASELCODE AS LOCCLASELCODE, LOC_CLACTECODE AS LOCCLACTECODE, LOC_CODE AS LOCCODE, LOC_NAME AS LOCNAME, LOC_INFO AS LOCINFO, LOC_POS AS LOCPOS FROM LOC WHERE (LOC_CLAPRDCODE = #{claPrdCode} AND LOC_CLASELCODE = #{claSelCode} AND LOC_CLACTECODE=#{claCteCode} )

SELECT CLA_SELCODE AS CLASELCODE, C LA_CTECODE AS CLACTECODE, CLA_PRDCODE AS CLAPRDCODE, CLA_INFO AS CLAINFO, PRD_NAME AS CLANAME, PRD_STARTDATE AS CLASTARTDATE, PRD_ENDDATE AS CLAENDDATE, TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YY-MM-DD')-PRD.PRD_STARTDATE AS CLASTATE1, PRD.PRD_ENDDATE-TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YY-MM-DD') AS CLASTATE2 FROM CLA INNER JOIN PRD ON(CLA.CLA_SELCODE=PRD.PRD_SELCODE AND CLA.CLA_CTECODE=PRD.PRD_CTECODE AND CLA.CLA_PRDCODE=PRD.PRD_CODE) WHERE CLA_SELCODE = #{selCode}

INSERT INTO CUR(CUR_CODE, CUR_CLAPRDCODE, CUR_CLASELCODE, CUR_CLACTECODE, CUR_NAME, CUR_INFO, CUR_STARTDATE, CUR_ENDDATE, CUR_TIME) VALUES ( (SELECT LPAD((SELECT NVL(MAX(CUR_CODE),0)+1 FROM CUR WHERE CUR_CLASELCODE=#{curClaSelCode} AND CUR_CLACTECODE=#{curClaCteCode} AND CUR_CLAPRDCODE=#{curClaPrdCode}),2,0)FROM DUAL) , #{curClaPrdCode}, #{curClaSelCode}, #{curClaCteCode}, #{curName}, #{curInfo}, TO_DATE(#{curStartDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{curEndDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{curTime})
mapper.delete: DELETE CUR WHERE CUR_CLASELCODE=#{curClaSelCode} AND CUR_CLACTECODE=#{curClaCteCode} AND CUR_CLAPRDCODE=#{curClaPrdCode} AND CUR_CODE=#{curCode}
mapper.select: SELECT ASS_CLASELCODE AS ASSCLASELCODE, ASS_CLACTECODE AS ASSCLACTECODE, ASS_CLAPRDCODE AS ASSCLAPRDCODE, ASS_CODE AS ASSCODE, ASS_NAME AS ASSNAME, ASS_INFO AS ASSINFO, ASS_STARTDATE AS ASSSTARTDATE, ASS_ENDDATE AS ASSENDDATE, ASS_MAXGRADE AS ASSMAXGRADE, ASS_ENDDATE-TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YY-MM-DD') AS ASSSTATE, TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YY-MM-DD')- ASS.ASS_STARTDATE AS ASSSTATE2 FROM ASS WHERE ASS_CLASELCODE=#{claSelCode} AND ASS_CLACTECODE=#{claCteCode} AND ASS_CLAPRDCODE=#{claPrdCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ASS(ASS_CLASELCODE, ASS_CLACTECODE, ASS_CLAPRDCODE, ASS_CODE, ASS_NAME, ASS_INFO, ASS_STARTDATE, ASS_ENDDATE, ASS_MAXGRADE) VALUES(#{assClaSelCode}, #{assClaCteCode}, #{assClaPrdCode}, (SELECT LPAD((SELECT NVL(MAX(ASS_CODE),0)+1 FROM ASS WHERE ASS_CLASELCODE=#{assClaSelCode} AND ASS_CLACTECODE=#{assClaCteCode} AND ASS_CLAPRDCODE=#{assClaPrdCode}),2,0)FROM DUAL) ,#{assName}, #{assInfo}, #{assStartDate}, #{assEndDate}, #{assMaxGrade})
mapper.delete: DELETE SBF WHERE SBF_SUBASSCLASELCODE=#{assClaSelCode} AND SBF_SUBASSCLACTECODE=#{assClaCteCode} AND SBF_SUBASSCLAPRDCODE=#{assClaPrdCode} AND SBF_SUBASSCODE=#{assCode}
DELETE SUB WHERE SUB_ASSCLASELCODE=#{assClaSelCode} AND SUB_ASSCLACTECODE=#{assClaCteCode} AND SUB_ASSCLAPRDCODE=#{assClaPrdCode} AND SUB_ASSCODE=#{assCode}
mapper.select: INSERT INTO NTC(NTC_CODE, NTC_CLAPRDCODE, NTC_CLASELCODE, NTC_CLACTECODE, NTC_NAME, NTC_INFO, NTC_DATE) VALUES ( (SELECT LPAD((SELECT NVL(MAX(NTC_CODE),0)+1 FROM NTC WHERE NTC_CLASELCODE=#{ntcClaSelCode} AND NTC_CLACTECODE=#{ntcClaCteCode} AND NTC_CLAPRDCODE=#{ntcClaPrdCode}),2,0)FROM DUAL) , #{ntcClaPrdCode}, #{ntcClaSelCode}, #{ntcClaCteCode}, #{ntcName}, #{ntcInfo}, SYSDATE)
mapper.delete: DELETE NTC WHERE NTC_CLASELCODE=#{ntcClaSelCode} AND NTC_CLACTECODE=#{ntcClaCteCode} AND NTC_CLAPRDCODE=#{ntcClaPrdCode} AND NTC_CODE=#{ntcCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SUB(SUB_ASSCLASELCODE, SUB_ASSCLACTECODE, SUB_ASSCLAPRDCODE, SUB_ASSCODE, SUB_STUORDBUYCODE, SUB_STUORDDATE, SUB_GRADE, SUB_INFO, SUB_DATE) VALUES (#{subAssClaSelCode},#{subAssClaCteCode},#{subAssClaPrdCode},#{subAssCode},#{subStuOrdBuyCode},TO_DATE(#{subStuOrdDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), DEFAULT, #{subInfo}, SYSDATE)

update.foreach: INTO SBF(SBF_SUBASSCLASELCODE, SBF_SUBASSCLACTECODE, SBF_SUBASSCLAPRDCODE, SBF_SUBASSCODE, SBF_SUBSTUORDBUYCODE, SBF_SUBSTUORDDATE, SBF_FILCODE,SBF_FILNAME, SBF_LOCATION ) VALUES(#{subAssClaSelCode}, #{subAssClaCteCode}, #{subAssClaPrdCode}, #{subAssCode},#{subStuOrdBuyCode}, TO_DATE(#{subStuOrdDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{fileInfo.sbfFilCode},#{fileInfo.sbfFilName},#{fileInfo.sbfLocation})

mapper.delete: DELETE SBF WHERE SBF_SUBASSCLASELCODE = #{subAssClaSelCode} AND SBF_SUBASSCLACTECODE=#{subAssClaCteCode} AND SBF_SUBASSCLAPRDCODE=#{subAssClaPrdCode} AND SBF_SUBASSCODE=#{subAssCode} AND SBF_SUBSTUORDBUYCODE=#{subStuOrdBuyCode} AND SBF_SUBSTUORDDATE = TO_DATE(#{subStuOrdDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')

DELETE SUB WHERE SUB_ASSCLASELCODE = #{subAssClaSelCode} AND SUB_ASSCLACTECODE=#{subAssClaCteCode} AND SUB_ASSCLAPRDCODE=#{subAssClaPrdCode} AND SUB_ASSCODE=#{subAssCode} AND SUB_STUORDBUYCODE=#{subStuOrdBuyCode} AND SUB_STUORDDATE = TO_DATE(#{subStuOrdDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
